subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer rallied in a third-set tie breaker Saturday to reach the Swiss Indoors final in Basel, beating Paradorn Srichaphan of Thailand, 6-4, 3-6, 7-6 (5), for his 23rd straight victory.
snippet: Roger Federer rallied in a third-set tie breaker Saturday to reach the Swiss Indoors final in Basel, beating Paradorn Srichaphan of Thailand, 6-4, 3-6, 7-6 (5), for his 23rd straight victory.
